name: Casa 1910 - Cavalry Edition - Lucero
additionalNotes:
Casa 1910 is a premium cigar brand that captures the proud spirit of the Mexican Revolution. The cigars are made in the San Andrés Valley, in the state of Veracruz, where the very high quality tobacco, part of this product, comes from. Launched in 2021, the Casa 1910 cigar brand was created to capture the passion and spirit of the Mexican Revolution. The cigars showcase the rich flavor and aroma of Mexican tobacco. Their Revolutionary Edition cigar the Cuchillo Parado is named after the first battle that marks the start of the revolution. The Tierra Blanca is named after a decisive battle fought by Pancho Villa. Both cigars are Mexican puros that offer a medium to full-bodied and balanced smoking profile. Their Cavalry Edition honors not only the riders but the horses that served during the revolution. This edition uses premium tobaccos from Mexico, Nicaragua, and Ecuador for a medium to full-bodied and flavorful smoking indulgence.
